methana aththe wanchawak.mowun bayisikal ranganayaka yedenawa.kata hollana salli walin wiski gahanawa.mowunge aragalaya panthi satanak noweyi panthiya maru kirime satanak.owun nidahas adhyapanaya gana katha karanawa.eeka sulu dhaneshwara satanpatayak.mokada nidahas adhyapanaya thamayi panthiya maru karagena thaman siti panthiyen salakum ganna ekama kramaya.dan me lagadi mama dakka rajya sewaye ithama piditha kotasa wana kastam niladharinge prashna gana katha karanawa.nidahas adhyapanayen patan ganna jawipe duk ganawili pahadiliyi.wishwa widyala mattamedi nidhas adhyapanaya inpasu waidyawarune,paripalana niladharinge prashna,dan kastam niladharinge prashna.apuruyi.jawipe aramudala tharakaraganna kastam eka paththe yanawada danne na.alluwath salli thallu kalath salline.

wasara siya dahas gananak nonasi pawathunu deshiya wedakama sandaha awashya karana aushadha drawyawala hingakama dinen dina ihala yamath, watina durlabha aushadha milen itha adhikawima saha ema aushadha laba ganimata nikuth karana balapathra laba nodimen deshiya wedakamata kanakoka handimata patan gena thibe.me nisa wisha, kadum, bindum wedakama thawaduratath idiriyata pawathwagena ya nohaki thaththwayak udgathawa athi bawa aayurweda deshiya waidyawaru penwa dethi.sarpa wedakamata ganna aushadha warga laba ganimata deshiya waidyawarunta nikuth karanu labana balapathra mathaka sita nikuth nokerena bawada danagannata thibe.ape rate itha hondin wadena thippili, kurakkan, aba, amukkara, amukaha ha sinhala kulubadu aadiya indiyawa wani pitaratawalin genwimata katayuthu kirimen eewa milen adhika wimath ese genwana aushadha warga ape rate wawena aushadha warga tharam gunadayi nowimenuth deshiya waidyawaru dadi asiruthawata pathwi sitithi.sarpa wisha pilibanda wisheshagnya waidyawarayaku wana godakawela kosnathota dabliw.

namuth yam kisi prathipadawakata anuwa dan simithawa thoragath pirisa thula mewa waga kala mema shakaya thulin yahapath aarthika prathipala laba ganimata kriya karayi.namuth thawamath nisiyakara prathipadana wala hingakama nisa meya waga kirimata malikamak dakwanne meyata athi thahanchi nisa bawa aacharya upul subasinhawadi duratath pawasayi.meya wyaptha kota nisi pala laba ganima sandaha niyamitha prathipadawak athi bawa nisakaya.

eeye agosthu 15,katholika aagame hatiyata eeye dawasa jesuthumage mawa mariyathumiya wenuwen kapa unu dawasa,mulu lokema mariya mawuthumiya wenuwen kapa unu dewasthana wala uthsawa dawasak,,lankaweth madu palliya athula mariyathumiya wenuwen kapa unu godak pradeshawala thiyana dewasthana wala uthsawa pawath una..supurudu widihata ma sitina nagarayeth laksha ganaka janathawakage sahabhagithwayen uthsawayak pawath una.ma me wagema me uthsawaya gana kipa warakma mage blog eken kiyala thiyanawa,,wathawak me uthsawe dawasema api serama uthsawe iddi ape ge athulu gewal kipayakatama horu panala suddayak dunna ape awata,,,polisi gihama ee weddi entri polimak,,pikpokat kes walata.ketiyen uthsawe gana kiwuwoth me jayarupaye thibena yakada walin hadapu me wishala upakaranaya minissu wishala pirisak yodagena kaba walin adan yanawa,anik poto eke inna kalu rajathuma saha siudu rajina,,ee denna thama me nagare ammayi thaththayi,nagareta aapu loku saginnak welawe,kalu raja nawak pirenna kanna bonna genalla,,eekata thaggak denna yaddi pora sudu ganiyek illala,,rajathumage duwa kamathi wela kalu rajathuma wiwaha kara ganna,,ithin ee dennagen thama me nagare nirmanaya wela thiyenne.ithin eeye uthsawe ekkama ee dennawath sihi karanawa.wena wasara wala wage neme me wasare me uthsawe harima cham,harima saralayi,itha adu wiyadamin itha lassana uthsawayak pawath una.nagara sabhawe salli nathi kama wagema aluth nagaradhipathige adu wiyadam salasum anuwa uthsawe wada iwara kala,,wenada thiyana noyek noyek aatopa me wathawe na,,ee ekkama payak thisse thibuna gini keli sandarshane winadi 10 iwarayi,minissuth itha kamathi una cham uthsaweta,,uthsawe patan ganna issalla nagaradhipathi kiwuwe min idiriyata me wage aagamika uthsawa walata mudal nasthi karanna nagara sabhawen mudal denne na kiyala,,dennath na kiyala,,minissu eekata kisi kenek wiruddha uneth na,anugraha mudal walin uthsawe chamwa iwara kala.eka athakin me wage uthsawa walata mudal kabasiniya karana ekath moda wadak thama.anthimedi kiyanne nagaradhipathi budu dahama anuwa sarala jiwithayak gewannek,ee ekkama pora nagare goda dannath ee sarala kamama yodaganne kiyala lagadi kiyala thibuna,tibet jathika dalayi lama thumawa saha pransis papthumawa me nagareta gennala samaye nagaraya widihata nam karannayi nagaradhipathige salasuma,,mokada eyage sarala kamata hethuwa ara denna kiyalayi nirantharayenma nagaradhipathi thuma kiyanne.lagadi api ganath podi tok ekak dunna,,shri lankikayinge ekamuthuwata eya godak sathutu wenawa kiyala.
